scripts.cleanup-linux: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && cd .. && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && cd ..
scripts.cleanup-windows: cd backend && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && cd .. && cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules && del package-lock.json && cd ..
scripts.frontend-build: cd frontend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.backend-build: cd backend && npm i && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run frontend-build && npm run backend-build && npm run backend-run
scripts.start-linux: npm run update-api-url && npm run frontend-build && npm run backend-build && npm run backend-run
scripts.deploy: npm run frontend-build && npm run backend-build && gh-pages -d build
